turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place an order for Starbucks that I'd be able to pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can do that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Grande cafe Americano, please? Hot with two Splendas and a thing of honey?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, so you said you'd like a Grande cafe americano with 2 splendas and 1 packet of honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want any milk in that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll edit your order to include 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want to order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Starbucks on California street. it should be ready for pick up in 6 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.
